title: Weekly Sales Team Standup
notes: Review pipeline progress, discuss blockers, and align on weekly priorities. Focus on Q1 targets.

title: Client Discovery Call - Global Systems
notes: Initial needs assessment call. Focus on understanding their current pain points and integration requirements.

title: Product Demo - TechStart Inc
notes: Demo core platform features. Prepare use cases specific to their industry vertical.

title: Quarterly Business Review
notes: Q4 results analysis and Q1 planning session. Review team performance metrics and set objectives.
